attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As an angler I am very aware that in Northern  Ireland the environmental quality of our waterways
Is being continuously degraded due to the long term failure of the Departments under your control.
I seek your immediate assurance on the items below; please write back to me to confirm your
Intended actions on these issues.

The length of time the new Northern Ireland Water Ltd will enjoy corporate Immunity from prosecution will be limited to finish in December 2007 with no further extension of any kind
The DoE Environment and Heritage Service is not fit for purpose and will be replaced immediately with a body which gives priority to the prosecution of polluters instead of their protection.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
